item.description:
Updates

  • Ability to filter search results locally - press /. Supports regex!
  • Persists queue over sessions.
  • Fix search spinner weirdness.
  • Esc cancels search in progress.
  • ...plus some other little fixes.

Updates

  • Ability to copy album link C-S-c, as well as track link C-c (as before)!
  • ? finds currently-playing album
  • Friendlier open.spotify.com link when copying
  • Now x also deletes queue items
  • Added C-{b,f,u,d} Vim-like paging keys
  • ...plus some other little fixes.

Updates

  • Basic Guile/Scheme support! Pause, next, get current song, as well as the ability to bind keys to arbitrary Scheme code. See the README for more information.
  • Create playlists from search results or the current queue.
  • Delete playlists from user library.
  • / filter is a bit smarter regarding your selection in search results. For example, narrow results with / then Esc leaves the filtered result selected.
  • Toggle button to disable auto-advancing on end-of-track event. Useful for "stop after currently-playing track".
  • ? will surface the album of the currently-playing track, and highlight the current track.
